title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5008.10 - Variations of the Lotto game
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5008.10 - Variations of the Lotto game

State Regulations

The commission may offer a variation of the Lotto game
that has a designated field of consecutive whole numbers beginning with one to
a number designated by the commission not greater than 60 from which a player
may select up to six numbers. The commission reserves the discretion to offer
additional versions of the Lotto game with different prize structures and
designated fields of numbers. If the commission offers an additional version of
the game, sections
5008.10
through
5008.16
of this Part shall continue
to apply. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
5008.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
